statements: UPDATE VisitorInformation SET visitor_name = 'Alice', visit_date = '2022-05-15 10:30:00', visit_purpose = 'Meeting', visitor_company = 'ABC Company' WHERE visitor_id = 101;
UPDATE VisitorInformation SET visit_date = '2022-06-20 15:00:00', visitor_company = 'XYZ Corporation', visitor_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE visitor_name = 'Alice';
UPDATE VisitorInformation SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', visitor_email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE VisitorInformation SET visit_date = '2022-10-15 08:00:00', visit_purpose = 'Meeting with the CEO' WHERE visitor_id = 2;
UPDATE visitors SET phone_number='1234567890' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE visit_logs SET purpose='Meeting' WHERE visitor_id=2;
UPDATE visitors SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE visit_logs SET purpose = 'Meeting', log_description = 'Detailed meeting notes' WHERE log_id = 10;
UPDATE Visitors SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
UPDATE Visits SET entry_time = '2022-05-20 10:00:00', exit_time = '2022-05-20 17:00:00' WHERE visit_id = 2;
UPDATE Visitors SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe' WHERE visitor_id=1;
UPDATE Visits SET exit_time='2022-08-15 18:30:00' WHERE visit_id=5;
UPDATE Visitors SET visitor_name = 'Alice', visitor_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE visitor_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Visits SET visit_status = 'Approved', visit_purpose = 'Meeting with management' WHERE visit_id = '234e5678-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE Visitors SET visitor_name = 'John Doe', visitor_phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE visitor_id = 'a0eebc99-9c0b-4ef8-bb6d-6bb9bd380a11';
UPDATE Visits SET visit_status = 'Approved', visit_timestamp = '2021-12-15 10:30:00' WHERE visit_id = '8b8c6842-7674-4919-a0e8-a3e84ee3e990';
UPDATE Visitor SET name='John Doe', email='johndoe@example.com' WHERE visitor_id=1;

UPDATE Visitor SET email = 'john.doe@example.com', phone_number = '+1234567890' WHERE visitor_id = 1;
